        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">

    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="83995" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="83995" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.06</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1328">1,328</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="314"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Cloud Pink</b> by <b>Ariana Grande</b> is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. <b>Cloud Pink</b> was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Clement Gavarry. Top notes are Pitahaya, Wild Berries and Pineapple; middle notes are Coconut Water, Vanilla Orchid and Ambrette; base notes are Praline, Musk, Amberwood and Moss. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Created by Firmenich's Clement Gavarry, Cloud Pink is a sensual blend of ambery woods, magenta moss, and a touch of sweetened praline. The journey begins with a velvety blend of rich berries and sparkling fruit while the delicatefloralcy of vanilla orchid and blush ambrette wrap you in an embrace of feathery, cotton-like clouds. The lasting impression, a warm blend of addictive, skin-sensual musk and amber woods indulge the senses.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this         </a>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2346718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346718" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nonrom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228105"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1228105.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nonrom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Midnight-Fantasy-802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight Fantasy"title="Midnight Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228105">nonrom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 13:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a like for me, but not a love.<br />
<br />
Very similar to OG cloud  which I used to love but then my nose/smell changed<br />
<br />
I fell in love with SDJ dragonfruit and began a hunt to find similar perfume  this and Burberry her were mentioned as being the closest.<br />
<br />
This and her are very similar.<br />
<br />
Cloud pink is more warm, less sweet or fruity, very similar to OG cloud  and definitely dries down to OG cloud.<br />
There is absolutely no point in owning both.<br />
<br />
Compared to this, her is more airy, more fruity/sweet. While they smell very similar to some people, they smell wildly different to me. So in that sense, Im glad I tested both.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2346718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2346718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345552" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luvflcwers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2203526"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2203526.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="luvflcwers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345552ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345552" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); It smelled too much like other fragrances in my collection. Then I discovered cloud pink. Ive been collecting cute perfume bottles on my dresser, and this fits perfectly along with my other Nicki Minaj perfumes. But on to the scent itself, its definitely sweeter than cloud. I like the muskiness of it as well! padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/735870">spicywasabi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 13:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought it, sprayed once and hated it. Immidiately sold it. <br />
<br />
I strongly dislike the original but I really wanted to give this one a try because many people have been hyping it, saying it is more fruity/tropical than the original. This is WORSE than the original! It smells like insects on my skin, like a caterpillar or a ladybug. So disgusting!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2312500"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2312500#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311525" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MandM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2189050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2189050.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MandM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Island-Fantasy-17575.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17575.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Island Fantasy"title="Island Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2189050">MandM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 14:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Let me preference this with: I do not like the original cloud. I also do not like this scent. But I do not think they smell anything alike. This version of cloud does not smell fruity to me at all. The only note I can smell in this perfume is the moss. Similar to how the only note I can smell in the original Cloud is lavender. My best guess is because I live in a very hot place. Every day in the summer it is 110/120 degrees. And in the winter the high is only ever 80 at the lowest. I think the heat mixed with my skin chemistry makes this a very earthy fragrance. With no other notes coming through.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2311525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2311525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305613" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2305613" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lunarose66"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814068"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1814068.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lunarose66" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2305613ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2305613" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814068">lunarose66</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 06:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just get the original cloud, Im so sick of this DNA</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2305613"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2305613#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2298705" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meow_chu_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2259655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2259655.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meow_chu_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2298705ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2298705" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2259655">meow_chu_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 03:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As I tantalizingly overspray my sensuous skin, I understand that yes...Pink Cloud IS giving Arianka...it's giving Ariani. No, it does not make me want to snatch away every male with a newly born child in a 50km radius, because the notes aren't fatal enough  and that's why I love it.<br />
<br />
Gorgeous sweetness and musk in the drydown, and a thrilling opening that shits all over the OG Cloud (fucking hate the bergamot). I can't tell what exactly the opening smells like, but it's the right mix between vanilla and fruit: she really knows her fanbase!!! The longevity is fleeting, just like her turbulent relationship history (Ari is really the Elizabeth Taylor of our time) but that's fine by me, since my favorite thing about Pink Cloud is how it sits so beautifully close to the skin. I keep on sniffing my wrists constantly, my tiny bottle that I purchased some weeks ago is now below 50% and I NEED MORE. <br />
<br />
Now I have to say this with my chest: the bottle is the worst part of the whole experience. Taking the bottle out of that plastic cloud pedestal to then realize it looks like a Chanel Allure bottle...I don't need that in my life. They should have produced maxi sizes of the 7.5ml versions instead!!! But that's a little detail that I can gloss over: it's a gorgeous everyday fragrance that you can layer or wear on its own, it's cheap, and *whistle notes* I love the way it makes me feel!    </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2298705"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2298705#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298682" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2298682" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vanillaandorange"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015838"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1015838.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vanillaandorange" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Hot-Couture-Eau-de-Toilette-11557.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11557.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hot Couture Eau de Toilette"title="Hot Couture Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2298682ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2298682" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015838">vanillaandorange</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 02:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I enjoyed wearing this over the summer. I see it as very lighthearted and it doesn't last all that long on me, but I like the combination of vanilla and fruity notes (I can't tell you if it really smells of dragonfruit, I don't think I've ever smelt a dragonfruit!) I probably wouldn't wear this if I wanted to be taken very seriously but it's great for when you're just having fun.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2298682"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2298682#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2287477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2287477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287050" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2287050" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anna_banana_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1723583.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anna_banana_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Gold-71608.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71608.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold"title="Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2287050ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2287050" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723583">anna_banana_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-18">09/18/24 10:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great, simple choice for a day you want to smell sweet and warm but light and playfully feminine. I personally do not get any of those top notes listed, but I smell all the middle and bottom notes. It gives almost a cotton candy vibe. If "pink" had a smell - it would smell like this. I love to layer with Rare Beauty Mist (the fresh lemon notes and warmth of Tonka are a beautiful combo) and the Sweet Like Candy body mist.<br />
I would consider this a very date blind buy if you like sweet scents</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2287050"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2287050#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285082" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cmccoskey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1754227"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cmccoskey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memoire-Archives/04-Wish-You-Were-Here-74583.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74583.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="04 Wish You Were Here"title="04 Wish You Were Here"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285082ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285082" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1754227">cmccoskey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 15:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like strawberry cotton candy until it dries down and ends up smelling like Cloud. Essentially, if you prefer super sweet fragrances and you like Cloud, get this one because it is a great combo!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2285082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2285082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284794" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Benjaminochjag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1651314"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1651314.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Benjaminochjag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1651314">Benjaminochjag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells disgusting. Like a hint of seacreatures so as shrimp and crawfish and also crabfish. And sooo much dill.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2284794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2284794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281175" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scheherazade_x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scheherazade_x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Jazz-Club-20541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jazz Club"title="Jazz Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492">Scheherazade_x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 02:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one smells like the Cupcake Doll toys I had in the early 90s; vanilla and artificial strawberry, maybe a touch of candy floss. Its a bit fruitier and less marshmallowy than the original cloud, but still very much a light, sweet scent with lots of whipped cream and praline. The base is perhaps a little earthier, with definite moss notes alongside the musk.<br />
<br />
This is a very fun, pink, girly scent, suitable both for the young and young at heart. Its an easy wear, definitely not complex or one I really find myself thinking about. Its longevity isnt quite as good as the original cloud, but its pleasant while it lasts, and just different enough (as a flanker) to offer something new.<br />
<br />
Its by no means sophisticated, but I like it. And the bottle is cute!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2281175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2281175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280161" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280069" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="weny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2241938"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2241938.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="weny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2241938">weny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 03:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fun candy beach club <br />
<br />
I initially liked this better than cloud, probably because its stronger and has more of a vibrant personality comparing to its more subtle sister, the og cloud. I dont like it as much as i did when i first tried it because its way too sweet and powdery for me and i dont think it fits my aesthetic. a lot of people are saying cloud has a plastic smell but i can def smell it on cloud pink too. <br />
<br />
But dont get me wrong, even tho i do prefer the og cloud when compared side to side, i love having this in my collection too!<br />
<br />
Update: I ended up decluttering this bottle because it smells a bit too youthful and strong for my liking, the sweetness is giving me a headache and im starting to notice the plastic synthetic note</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2280069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2280069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276881" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="melody07k"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192614"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2192614.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="melody07k" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276881ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276881" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192614">melody07k</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 08:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm wearing this today! It smells like walking into a candy shop:)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2276881"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2276881#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274918" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274918" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stormy_Cloud9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2244713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stormy_Cloud9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274918ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274918" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244713">Stormy_Cloud9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 12:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If original cloud were a 25 year old woman, cloud pink is her 15 year old baby sister. This is the more fruitier juvenile version. The opening smells like strawberries, the dry down is almost completely identical. It still smells like creamy whipped cream, just without the coconut. I can't smell any amber in this at all. The projection and longevity is the same. This is a woman's perfume. If you love fruity gourmand perfumes this is a safe blind buy. But I'm just bored enough from the original cloud, I have a full bottle of this an it's never going to be used again. This has more of a plastic/synthetic smell than original cloud. <br />
<br />
My grandmother used to wear Liz Taylor's white diamonds, just like many other traditionalist women at the time because it was so popular. I think in 50 years from now, millennials will still be buying cloud. There's just so many dupes out there that are similar it's insane.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2274918"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2274918#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270468" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emmaleegeek"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813789"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emmaleegeek" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270468ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270468" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813789">Emmaleegeek</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 14:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Does anyone know why there is a rusty crust around the atomizer? I have never seen this happen with any other fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2270468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2270468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039301">Fashionplatefanny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 07:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hate her as a person and artist, hate Cloud and all her other fragrances however I like this one. This is the only exception. I love the opening better than the dry down, theres something almost menthol, not sure what it is. Very comfortable fragrance, sweet but not sickly, the moss isnt too dusty, its a fairy floss kind of scent, very feminine, interesting enough. <br />
<br />
Has good longevity. <br />
<br />
Too expensive for a celebrity fragrance though considering that is marketed towards young women. Since when should a celebrity fragrance cost $60+ ? <br />
Bottle is cute.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2257286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2257286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249501" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1440375">layyelisee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 16:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im not a fan of celebrity fragrances and I primarily purchase niche fragrances but this perfume smelled so amazing that I couldnt help but buy it. <br />
*There is no lasting power. It lasts for about 10 minutes on the skin, even after moisturizing. <br />
<br />
It definitely has some Baccarat and Burberry Her DNA in it, which is probably why I fell in love with it. <br />
It smells expensive, feminine, and is a strong scent, which I absolutely love.<br />
I highly recommend this perfume if youre looking for an Ariana Grande fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2249501"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2249501#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Now I can pair it with the 2 body lists I mentioned earlier.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2242265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2242265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237114" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2237114" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sleepingbeau"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1818992.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sleepingbeau" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2237114ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2237114" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818992">sleepingbeau</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 17:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While Cloud is a perfectly unisex, complex perfume, this is its younger, feminine sister who likes to have fun and doesn't take herself too seriously. Though it's not listed in the notes, it really does smell like cotton candy the most. Fluffy, airy like its older brother, it's undoubtedly fruity and reminiscent of funfairs with an added touch of musk. It's not an unique scent by all means since it will remind you of Cheirosa 68 and Burberry Her but that does make it perfect for layering, if you are into that!<br />
<br />
If you use Cloud often, it makes for a perfect duo in your rotation since they are similar enough yet suit different seasons, so they make for a very smooth transition into each other. Use Blue for Autumn/Winter and Pink for Spring/Summer and you'll have your signature on lock!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2237114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2237114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1157351">Gemsense</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 07:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just have to make an observation  in my 20s and 30s I was kind of like this is too juvenile for me at whatever age- just like with cartoons as a teenager/ like Im too grown for them. Well Im 42 now and I openly love cartoons, Ill wear whatever smells great and I dont attach age or maturity level to any of it. Its freedom being in my 40s </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2236566"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2236566#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2234642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gionnijulius1820"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1622515"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1622515.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gionnijulius1820" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Idole-Now-81792.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81792.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Idle Now"title="Idle Now"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2234642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2234642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1622515">Gionnijulius1820</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-31">07/31/24 07:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>my absolute favorite cloud! She really surprises me each time I wear her. She is sweet, she is pretty fruity....but she also has that same fluffiness from the OG cloud, and I also get a warmness from her most the time. I feel like the weather really effects this perfume. More warm in winter more airy, fluffy fruits in summer? idk I need to test that theory. BUT regardless I actually very much enjoy her and she last ALL DAY. Def worth the money &amp; the best cloud! I am a wild berries, vanilla orchid &amp; ambrette junkie tho so it makes sense....then add in coconut water, dragon fruit and praline...perfection imo. wonderful cheap buy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; On the top theres some citrus that doesnt smell fresh that doesnt really blend with the rest. Its so strange I dont understand when someone says how girly this is. Its so masculine to me, and off putting with the strange string of notes barely making this a good flanker at all. Its a peculiar perfume. Not in the ways that I like. Id say this smells like leaves turning, now if that was the selling point Id love that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2219854"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2219854#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2201798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2201798" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SailorMars657"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/841257"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.841257.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SailorMars657" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2201798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2201798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/841257">SailorMars657</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-28">06/28/24 03:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love Cloud Pink. This reminds of a mix of sweet treats you would buy at a fair, like a mix of cotton candy and funnel cake. It also has a slight nail salon smell too, like the acrylic powder mixed in with the gourmand sweetness. This is perfect for a fun flirty summer day or night out. Projection, silage and longevity are all slightly above average which is nice surprise coming from a celebrity fragrance. This will always be in my fragrance rotation as long as its available, I say go for it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2201798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2201798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180681" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="connwonn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298866"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="connwonn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180681ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180681" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298866">connwonn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 23:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was let down by Cloud. I liked Cloud 2.0, but it lacked the summer vibe I was looking for. Cloud Pink takes the cake, offering the summer sweetness with a girly, fruity twist. I wear this one all the time, and get complimented on it even after hours of wear into the night. I find it easy to layer, as well!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2180681"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2180681#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2177739" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="saroraa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1957264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1957264.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="saroraa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zimaya/Fatima-Pink-92817.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92817.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fatima Pink"title="Fatima Pink"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2177739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2177739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1957264">saroraa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 09:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I hate the OG Cloud but this one is okay. It's quite similar to Sweet Like Candy but with something marzipan-y (I guess it's the praline?)<br />
It's not the most original or amazing fragrance, but if you just want to smell sweet and not stand out it's fine.<br />
Lattafa's Yara is a similar creamy tropical fragrance that's way better imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2177739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2177739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Today I went perfume shopping but I didnt want to spend much money so I got this. I expected this to be quite on the weaker side and for it to not last but I was SO wrong. I didnt even spray a full spray but I can smell this everywhere around my room and its been like 10 hours. Its not even close to weak like as soon as Im my my door not even inside I can smell this. So worth it I am shocked.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2175908"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2175908#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2173407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's fluffy and sweet, and I would describe this as a gourmand unlike the OG cloud, which to me is weird, artificial and powdery. A very girly perfume that could be considered juveline, but has great longevity for the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2173407"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2173407#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171839" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153169">mrgnliana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-29">05/29/24 17:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am not a fan of the original version or the 2.0, but I was able to smell this recently at Ulta. Cloud Pink in my opinion is the best out of the three. The scent is fruity and juicy but also fluffy and airy and the dry down is creamy, musky, and slightly woody. On the down side, the longevity is not the best. I find myself respraying after 2-3 hours. If youre a big fan of skin scents, or lighter scents with a fruity side, this one is a great option.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2171839"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2171839#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170913" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Its really, I mean REALLY sweet. For me, it was only the sweetness that came through and nothing like a sweet yet sophisticated scent. I smelled whipped cream and marshmellow right off the bat and they just lingered on. Didnt really get the top notes (fruits and berries) or the bottom notes because its synthetic marshmellowy sweetness was covering them all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156901" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="louiee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1138223"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1138223.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="louiee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Instant-Crush-54885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Instant Crush"title="Instant Crush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156901ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156901" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1138223">louiee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 10:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells sweet and crisp like pink maccarons. Similar to the original Cloud but sweeter, nothing masculine and a much weaker silage and longevity. I really adore this for summer and spring days. More sugar no coconut more fruity and youthfull.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2156901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2156901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152320" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2152320" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dontwannasmellbroke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2122933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dontwannasmellbroke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2152320ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2152320" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2122933">dontwannasmellbroke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 22:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initial spray smelt terrible, sickly and cheap. Very synthetically sweet fruity. However, after an hour or so on the skin the base notes come through and it smells truly amber-y and sugary and fruity scent disappears, which I prefer. But the initial smell is so bad that I don't think its worth it tbh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2152320"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2152320#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It last for about an hour on my skin. It smells more fruiter than the others.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2142419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2142419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029931">PhantomBelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 07:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My skin amplifies the musk, amberwood and moss in this fragrance so much it makes it hard for me to wear it--the top notes can't make it smooth/fruity/sweet enough to tolerate. It is a long lasting fragrance on skin and clothes, it's just not for me. A good value for the people who can pull it off. Work safe, not blind buy safe. Purchased at: Ulta</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2141011"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2141011#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138397" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
