I like the perfume and the bottle, but, in my opinion, if you already have the OG, you don't need this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2131382"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2131382#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128749" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="_gracemoore"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094720"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2094720.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="_gracemoore" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128749ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128749" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094720">_gracemoore</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 14:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love both Cloud and Cloud 2.0 but I hate this fragrance. Its my least favorite in Arianas line but Im really happy I tried it because I also hate Cheirosa 68 and they both open with intense dragon fruit so now I now to avoid that like the plague. After the top notes fade youre left with a more girly version of Cloud, like if you mixed Cloud with a VS body spray. If thats your thing and you dont hate dragon fruit like me, then you could potentially like it but I just find it unnecessary in the lineup.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2128749"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2128749#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120183" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120183" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mikajla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720637"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mikajla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-7-Virtues/Vanilla-Woods-52560.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52560.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Woods"title="Vanilla Woods"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120183ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120183" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720637">mikajla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-10">04/10/24 05:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i have a new signature for spring and summer :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2120183"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2120183#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113835" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2113835" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J4smine.x0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="J4smine.x0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2113835ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2113835" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082949">J4smine.x0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-04">04/04/24 04:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very feminine girly scent, it is quite light so it doesn't last as long but its still good! Very sweet and good for summer/spring. When you first spray it it can smell quite alcoholy but when it dries down it is really nice. I do understand why people say it smells fake and plasticy but it depends on your preference if you mind or not. Sometimes too much may give you a headache but its great value and i do recommend you test it before you buy since everyones preferences are different. Personally, i quite like it but its not the most mind blowing scent in the world.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2113835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2113835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107850" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Indulgence"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1197661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Indulgence" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Le-Beau-Parfum-34026.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34026.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Parfum"title="Le Beau Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107850ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107850" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197661">Indulgence</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-29">03/29/24 07:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells really really good! I prefer Cloud and Cloud 2.0 Intense but this is really good!<br />
<br />
It reminds me a little of Schicks Raspberry Rain shave gel but obviously a million times better. I definitely smell the berries and marshmallows with the orchid far in the background. I dont smell the pineapple much. Its as if it has been caramelized such that the tartness was toned down because I dont get any of the sour or tart notes Id expect from pineapple. I smell the coconut water and its subtle. The perfume smells REALLY pink to me. It truly is a sweet pink fluffy cloud of goodness. Very gourmand. Very comforting. <br />
<br />
The woman who wears this has a sweet bubbly personality. <br />
<br />
I dont associate it with any specific season or time of day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2107850"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2107850#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2104653" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luri4581"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492603.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="luri4581" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Fleur-Musc-for-Her-42580.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42580.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur Musc for Her"title="Fleur Musc for Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2104653ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2104653" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492603">luri4581</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 07:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sugary pink mist straight from heaven. This smells delectable and I'm not even a gourmand fan in general (even though I know it must look like I am, going by my profile)! So I guess that says something about Cloud Pink's yumminess. <br />
<br />
I appreciate the fresher, fruitier notes when compared to Cloud or Cloud Intense, but I still wouldn't think of this as one for Summer, despite many others calling it summery. While it has tropical, somewhat refreshing aspects that make me think of summer sorbet, I personally think the cozier, fuller, more wintry notes prevail. Would be cloying to me on a hot day. It's still predominantly a warm and fluffy textured fragrance to my nose, personally. Maybe for Spring, just not Summer. But definitely for Autumn and Winter, which Australia is now entering into just in time for me to douse myself in a pink Cloud of sweet, milky musk!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2104653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2104653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2104207" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rosalea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2048457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2048457.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rosalea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2104207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2104207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); It still has that cloud dna, but has this different sweetness on the top. I'm OBSESSED with it and can't stop smelling it!! It's like, a slightly less lavender-y and creamy version of cloud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2104207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2104207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2103286" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1867032">obsession33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-25">03/25/24 00:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a tester of this perfume. As soon as I sprayed it on myself, I immediately got compliments from my colleagues which was quite surprising ( usually they don't compliment any of my fragrances). This perfume is truly unforgettable, I haven't smelled something delicious like this one. It has a lot of notes underneath, so the perfume opens in a very interesting way. <br />
My only concern is wearing this perfume on 32 (I hope I am wrong). I guess it is not mature enough for me. But as soon as 1 of my perfumes going to end, I will totally consider this beautiful option to buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2103286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2103286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2101964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2101964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2099558" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2099558" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anamawsity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1997817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anamawsity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2099558ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2099558" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817">anamawsity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-21">03/21/24 10:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first sprayed this, I was so happy because it was less floral on me than Cloud and Cloud Intense and was instead sweeter and fruitier. However, after about 15 minutes, it faded into a near match to them. I still like it better than the other 2 because of the sweetness, but I probably wont be buying a full bottle. It has a nice personal sillage and lasts about 6 hours. In terms of perfumes listed as similar<br />
 SDJ Carioca Crush: the initial spray of Cloud Pink smells quite similar, but after about 15 minutes, it turns much more floral<br />
Burberry Her: only smells similar after the first 15 minutes of Cloud Pink<br />
 Oakcha Sweven: Cloud Pink is sweeter for the first 10 mins, then its similar<br />
 Commodity Juice: a rhubarb and rose scent<br />
 Lattafa Yara: much more tropical<br />
 Michel Germain Sugarful Sunshine: much more tropical</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2099558"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2099558#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098155" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2098155" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shannon_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1077511"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1077511.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shannon_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kyse-Perfumes/Delizia-di-Marshmallow-56189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delizia di Marshmallow"title="Delizia di Marshmallow"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2098155ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2098155" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1077511">Shannon_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-20">03/20/24 04:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has quickly become one of my top favorites! I much prefer this to the original cloud. The original feels more dry/cool and cloud pink feels juicy/bright. The lasting power on this is pretty good, I get around 6-8 hours. I usually pair this with sdj cheirosa 68 and that combo is a HUGE compliment grabber!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2098155"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2098155#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098083" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081874" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katyb23x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1666145"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="katyb23x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1666145">katyb23x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 10:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was love at first sniff for me, it's basically Cloud but fruity and has a cotton candy sweetness. Definitely more girly and juvenile, but I have no problem wearing it in my late 20s. The only issue is that the scent fades in minutes! The first few minutes are heavenly but it just doesn't last, compared to Cloud which lasts MONTHS on my jackets. Sadly I can't recommend anyone buys it due to this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2081874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2081874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081248" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081248" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fairycoffins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1446497"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1446497.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fairycoffins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Bonbon-23317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bonbon"title="Bonbon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081248ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081248" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1446497">fairycoffins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-03">03/03/24 16:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested this today at Ulta out of curiosity, as I own Cloud and Cloud Intense. Honestly this smells a lot like the OG Cloud, but obviously minus the lavender and with added fruitiness. I didnt get much sillage or longevity out of a single test spray, and I dont think I could justify purchasing a full bottle, but I will admit she is definitely a pretty girl.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2081248"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2081248#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2079731" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ivagdkv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2039689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2039689.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ivagdkv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83995.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud Pink"title="Cloud Pink"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2079731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2079731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2039689">Ivagdkv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-02">03/02/24 05:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the most beatifull smells. <br />
Bring back childhood memories and reminds me of opening a Barbie doll in the summer (this sweet, vanilla, plastic smell that every Barbie doll had). This smell is so addictive - i can smell the pineaple and vanilla, maybe marshmallow. I was feeling like the old pyramid was closer to the reality.The old notes here that made me buy it was:<br />
<br />
Top notes:<br />
vanila, coconut<br />
Middle notes:<br />
pineaple<br />
Base notes:<br />
praline, moos, woody notes<br />
<br />
PS: For those like me who doesn't like berries - it doesn't smell like this or my nose can't detect it. The official notes gives me more mature, earthy and floral vibes. But for me it's girly, pink, barbie, sweet, vanilla perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2079731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2079731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2078276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2068435" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Flowerfruit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1723781.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Flowerfruit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Flora-Gorgeous-Jasmine-75190.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75190.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flora Gorgeous Jasmine"title="Flora Gorgeous Jasmine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2068435ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2068435" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723781">Flowerfruit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-20">02/20/24 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like a sweeter version of Cloud with a stronger cotton candy note. Its youthful and innocent. The scent is intoxicating for the first hour but unfortunately dries down to a rotten, metallic note.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2068435"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2068435#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2065002" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2065002" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Flexwithviv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1553890"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Flexwithviv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Katy-Perry/Killer-Queen-18318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Killer Queen"title="Killer Queen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2065002ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2065002" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1553890">Flexwithviv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-17">02/17/24 06:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive got this for my daughter for her birthday because she has the original. She said that it smells like medicine to her, and told me to have it.<br />
<br />
I think its not bad, but I find it too light, glad its only the  30ml that I purchased. I find it extremely similar to Cheirosa 68.However, I prefer Cheirosa 68 for some reason. I think I will be layering the two. I find that I cant smell it in my skin for too long, but on clothing it lasts a little while.<br />
<br />
I definitely feel that its not a must have if you have a fragrance in your collection with the baccarat DNA, because you can easily layer it with a fruity scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2065002"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2065002#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064922" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Malibu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7892"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.7892.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Malibu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Avon/Attraction-Intense-77319.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77319.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Attraction Intense"title="Attraction Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7892">Malibu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-17">02/17/24 04:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I admit that I'm struggling to come up with a new review for Cloud Pink because it is basically Cloud, with a few drops of dragon fruit [pitahaya] replacing the distinct florals. The new fruit notes give this a bit more of a softer fresh-but-sweet berry infused tropical fruit mix opening, as opposed to the more distinct bergamot-lead opening in the original Cloud. If the fruit was stronger &amp; longer-lasting I'd be more enthused about the opening blend, but as it is it's a frustrating glimpse of wasted potential for a more unique twist. I found the longevity to be slightly lower than the original at around 4 to 5 hours, and the aura a bit smaller since the fragrance becomes close to the skin pretty quickly [around 2 hours]. <br />
<br />
The big letdown for me is the lack of distinct floral notes - this makes the blend very linear. In my opinion it is the floral notes that make Cloud stand out from the brand's usual 'barely there' approach to floral notes in their releases, so without that stamp in a Cloud release, well, what do you really have left? Something nice enough, but ultimately something extremely similar to what this brand has already done before multiple times in their unrelated releases.<br />
<br />
Cloud Pink is one of those fragrances I call nice-but-safe; nothing original &amp; outstandingly different on offer, but there's nothing disagreeable here. If you enjoy the Ariana Grande fragrances, particularly Cloud, Thank U Next, or Mod Vanilla, then you will probably like this too, as the basic framework for them all is the same. Ultimately all that I can say is that I don't regret picking Cloud Pink up when it was on a special price offer, but it isn't something I'll bother replacing when it's gone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2064922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2064922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2060545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060545" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nymphali"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2005206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2005206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nymphali" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2005206">nymphali</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-12">02/12/24 19:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i LOVE this. when i smelled it at ulta i knew i had to have it. the musky and warm sweeter tones beautifully wrap around the berry note. i feel like it lasts longer on my skin compared to other perfumes i own too. i spray it on me even when im just chilling at home or in bed. i have no complaints.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I must say I couldnt smell anything at first and it didnt blend well with my chemistry BUT I sprayed it all over and as I was walking there was this beautiful cloud (no pun intended) of sweetness around me. This is no where near as strong as the original and I had high hopes but this review is not final, I still need some more time with it especially in cold weather, it doesnt work with the heat!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; While it's not an expensive smelling perfume, that doesn't mean it's a bad thing. I actually love this perfume. Like if you picture yourself sitting in a brand new car, chewing on a piece of Cotton Candy Bubble Yum then you will know what this smells like. It definitely has Britney "Fantasy" vibes to it. I dont usually like Ariana grande perfume especially not regular cloud but this one is way softer and more fruity and calm. Not so harsh with the vanilla and whipped cream smell. This one kind of smells like a fruity cotton candy fruit salad. Does that even make any sense? lol. This is my boyfriends favorite scent on me and he is always asking me to wear it its a big compliment getter. The only complaint I have is sadly it doesnt last very long on the clothes and on the skin as well:/ This is a nice scent to have in your collection and if you like pink bottles then this is definitely for you. It smells kind of similar to Burberry her with less of the sweet strawberry syrup smell to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2026717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2026717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2026616" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2016482" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maisie13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951852"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="maisie13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2016482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2016482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951852">maisie13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-31">12/31/23 17:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i absolutely love the original cloud and wanted to love this one too but something about it is just off for me. it has the same creamy dna as the original cloud but the added fruity notes just dont blend well for me and stick out weirdly. I also get quite a synthetic almost dentist office smell on my skin that i cant shake. I can see why other people like this but it just isnt for me or my skin chemistry. Wont be repurchasing and will stick the original</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2016482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2016482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015456" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sabs1205"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640805"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1640805.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sabs1205" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640805">sabs1205</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-30">12/30/23 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the original Cloud and Cloud 2.0 perfumes. When I got this, and sprayed it on my clothes and skin, I fell in love right away! Yes, the same notes that are in the original Cloud and the musk of Cloud 2.0 are in Cloud Pink, but the fruity notes are what make it absolutely delicious!<br />
And for some reason, even though fruity perfumes dont last as long as others, this version of Cloud has lasted on me the longest! Vegan and cruelty free perfume at a great price point by ariana grande? YES PLEASE. Im beyond in love!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2015456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2015456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2014730" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2014730" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kawaiithugg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796535"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1796535.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="kawaiithugg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juicy-Couture/Viva-La-Juicy-Sucre-42053.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42053.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viva La Juicy Sucre"title="Viva La Juicy Sucre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2014730ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2014730" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796535">kawaiithugg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-29">12/29/23 20:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this as a gift from my in laws &amp; have the original cloud.<br />
This is so nice- very similar to cloud but with a berries &amp; cream opening that I really enjoy. <br />
Cloud is more of a winter scent where as this one feels more like spring &amp; summer. <br />
<br />
I really enjoy this so much! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2014730"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2014730#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012918" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012918" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maddie2503"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="maddie2503" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012918ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012918" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555081">maddie2503</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-28">12/28/23 04:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is what the original Cloud shouldve been. <br />
<br />
It took me a very long time to warm up to Cloud. It was too synthetic / sharp, to me it just smelled like weird chemicals and BO. But, as a huge Ariana Grande fan, when I saw it on sale for $15 at Walgreens I decided to pick it up and give it my best shot.<br />
<br />
I fell in love! It took me a few tries to really get an understanding of the dry down. Then I really liked it. BUT, I was not happy with the sharpness still. I would layer it with something super juicy sweet to try to take the edge off.<br />
<br />
Then Cloud Pink comes out, and upon smelling the nozzle I thought wow that smells identical to Cloud, what a cash grab. But once I sprayed it on the skin I really smelled a huge difference.<br />
<br />
This is the sweeter, fruitier, more feminine version of cloud. This is exactly what I wanted the original Cloud to be. If they added more gourmand sweetness to Cloud it would be cloying and overwhelming. But the added sweetness with all of the fruity notes is EXACTLY what was needed.<br />
<br />
It starts very fruity, dries down into a fluffy sweet sweater scent if that makes sense. No medicinal sharp note like Cloud OG.<br />
<br />
I think this is perfect for every season, night or day, whatever. Its affordable and smells amazing. I dont see this as a tropical strictly summer scent at all, in fact I dont get tropical at all. Its fruity but not coconutty where you cant wear it in winter.  This could easily be anyones everyday fragrance 365 days a year. Absolutely LOVE this perfume!!!!! 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2012918"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2012918#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1908082">neomeii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-26">12/26/23 10:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just got this perfume today and Im so pleased with it! To me this smells exactly like the original cloud perfume except sweeter. I dont smell the tropical notes at all, just a sweeter girlier scent. If you prefer more mature scents Id go for the original cloud, but if you prefer sweeter/girlier scents Id definitely recommend this one!! Good blind buy:)<br />
<br />
After a couple hours of wearing it, I actually smell the pineapple. I was extremely wrong about not smelling the tropical notes </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2011087"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2011087#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2009412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009412" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anna32sverige"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1884046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1884046.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anna32sverige" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goutal/Tenue-de-Soiree-39469.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39469.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tenue de Soiree"title="Tenue de Soiree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2009412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2009412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2009364" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009364" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amantedelte"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791928"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1791928.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amantedelte" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/By-the-Fireplace-31623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="By the Fireplace"title="By the Fireplace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009364ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009364" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791928">amantedelte</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-24">12/24/23 01:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was so excited to try this release, my daughter has the original Cloud &amp; I love that but was keen to smell the extra fruity notes in this flanker, if you are a fresh, sparkling sweet, subtle Musk (with a smoother dry down) perfume kinda gal, this is for you! Perfect for Summer, such an addictive scent. <br />
True to the original Cloud DNA, but I prefer it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2009364"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2009364#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008006" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2008006" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Texasperumefan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1152862"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Texasperumefan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2008006ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2008006" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1152862">Texasperumefan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 11:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first spray, I was hit with that baby wipe smell that cloud also has. This was less overwhelming because it has no lavender. After it settled it smells sweet. Smells like cotton candy, light musk, and something fruity, like melon or a berry of some kind, with a vanilla undertone. You cannot really distinguish what fruit it has, its just airy, sweet, and fruity. No coconut or berry or pineapple notes stand out. Between this, and the OG, the OG is way better in terms of longevity &amp; depth. Much more depth. This smells sweet, and light. Much less overwhelming. I guess it depends on personal preference, but I can barely smell this on myself. Doesnt have the same impact as Cloud. I will keep it, but I wont repurchase this one. Im on my second Cloud bottle, and I will repurchase when I finish it.<br />
<br />
<br />
Update: Longevity is on par with the OG cloud. It definitely needed time to sit. Smells light but lasts forever. Does much better on clothes than on skin, I will stick to spraying it on my clothes, and hope for the release of Pink Cloud Intense. You can get a very similar scent, Sugar Sky for about 5.99 at Victorias Secret Pink.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2008006"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2008006#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2004933" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frag_sweet_lady"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frag_sweet_lady" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2004933ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2004933" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402067">Frag_sweet_lady</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-18">12/18/23 23:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so terrible. I literally just sprayed it on myself in Ulta, immediately felt annoyed by the stench and got a headache. I couldnt wait to wash it off but it wouldnt come off after 2 washes I still smell it! Horrible!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2004933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2004933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2003438" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
