The extra sweetness curdles the scent rather than making it lighter or more feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2000580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2000580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2000227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2000227" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aveline"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238528"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1238528.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aveline" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2000227ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2000227" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238528">Aveline</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-13">12/13/23 09:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is to the OG Cloud what Burberry Her Elixir is to the OG Her. Remove the weird mens deodorant quality and crank up the sweetness. It isn't quite as airy either. In this sense it makes it a little more ordinary when compared to the instantly recognizable Cloud, but also a bit less polarizing. There is a bit of a chemical quality without being too overwhelming or offensive. Cute but not really something I or most others with a small girly/gourmand collection would need. Would probably be a safe gift for a young girl or anyone who enjoys sweet scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2000227"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2000227#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998633" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1998633" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="achatina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1976.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="achatina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1998633ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1998633" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976">achatina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-11">12/11/23 13:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have all clouds and if we expect them to be a dupe for you know what this is the best of them. It has this this fruity background that is there in BR (the other two are nice, similar but there is too much coconut and vanilla to be very close) And it is also a great scent  without comparing it to anything else. Cloud pink is the only one I will ever rebuy. I see similarities to Cheriosa 68 too and agree it is like a perfume version of the mist, which makes me very happy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1998633"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1998633#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995946" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Charli3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404608"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1404608.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Charli3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jennifer-Lopez/Limitless-93489.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93489.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Limitless"title="Limitless"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404608">Charli3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-08">12/08/23 09:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you are scared of trying this because you disliked the original Cloud, dont worry its so much better than Cloud OG. This one is sparkly, fruity, sweeter (almost cotton candy like). I dislike original cloud very much. I find the dentistry and the coconut and lavender note albeit subtle are annoying enough that its a big no. <br />
Pink and girly and decent longevity. Also a crowd pleaser.<br />
<br />
For what its worth I like this one way better than Cheirosa 68- they are not dupes, Cheirosa is softer and less sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1995946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1995946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1989159" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lightbloom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lightbloom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Believe-1410.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1410.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Believe"title="Believe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1989159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1989159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337302">lightbloom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 13:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Let me start by saying I dislike both of the other Clouds for their cloying coconut note. To me it's nauseating, and I can't get past it. I know a lot of people love it, but it's not for me.<br />
<br />
This Cloud is not like the others. This is Ari beating Sol De Janeiro to the punch of making a Cheirosa 68 edp. <br />
It's not too fruit punch-y, nor shampoo-ey. I love it, and now I have no reason to repurchase the wonderfully sweet, but terribly short lived body spray. Cloud Pink usually gives me at least a good 6-8 hours on skin (best on freshly moisturized skin).<br />
First I got a sample tester in the mail and I went back in store to test it again, left with a travel spray, finished it and went for the 3.4 oz. Mostly I smell the tropical fruits (I love a good dragonfruit and pineapple), ambrette, and moss. I love how it's tropical fruity cotton candy, but the vibe is cozy, comfy, but effortlessly cute, and feels equally welcome in warm or cold weather. If coconut is present, it's more in texture or tone than like, a flavor note. The opening harshness is brief and artificial and smells like opening up a fresh VHS box, particularly the thick plastic Disney ones. Nostalgic.<br />
<br />
Ari frags are lovely. They know their place as utilitarian gourmands - the feel-good, smell-good workhorses of the celeb realm. The ones I own (GIAW, SLC, REM) always net me tons of compliments, and Cloud Pink is no different. This has quickly become one of my favorites, and most worn scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1989159"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1989159#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988444" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988444" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChristyCheryl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/360916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.360916.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChristyCheryl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988444ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988444" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/360916">ChristyCheryl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 15:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells almost identical to Pacifica's dream moon. It's the more feminine version of the original cloud, it smells like cloud without the sharper notes and then add sweet like candy's berry notes into the mix - really nice, but by the end of the day, it smells almost chemically to me but I think it's just the pineapple note lingering on by itself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1988444"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1988444#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985806" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985806" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaxieF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263309.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaxieF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/La-Belle-55786.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55786.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Belle"title="La Belle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985806ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985806" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263309">MaxieF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-26">11/26/23 12:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you want beachy, go with intense. <br />
If you want sweet, go with Pink.<br />
<br />
They are absolutely similar but I think they both serve their own purpose. I personally like Pinks cotton candy opening, though that doesn't stay. It smells delicious either way. Both have the same lasting power. But honestly I haven't smelled a more realistic cotton candy note thank the one in Pink. Everything that claims to be cotton candy always just smells like fruit or some sort of candy but never that spun sugar smell. The only other fragrance that smells remotely like cotton candy is outremer vanilla. That's a really good one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1985806"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1985806#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1984569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1984569" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blackcat808"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1525014"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1525014.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blackcat808" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Tease-Eau-de-Parfum-2020-64012.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64012.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tease Eau de Parfum 2020"title="Tease Eau de Parfum 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1984569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1984569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1525014">Blackcat808</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-24">11/24/23 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I adore this one and I can't say whether I like this or Intense 2.0 better. I personally think it smells more similar to Intense 2.0 than OG Cloud as I find the original to be a bit watered down in comparison. <br />
<br />
Though super similar and still carrying that same fluffy, creamy DNA - Pink is the slightly fruitier, spun sugar, more feminine version. 2.0 leans a little more unisex due to the lavender note that's absent in Pink. Pink is also a bit more versatile throughout the year with the added fruity notes whereas the two prior varieties are more fall, winter oriented. I do believe 2.0 smells a bit more "deep" and even a little more "expensive" to me but they're both incredibly intoxicating and I'd say the biggest differentiating factor when choosing between the two (or three if considering the original) is if you want a little fruitiness and extra sweetness or not. <br />
<br />
On a final note - I find the performance to be better than the original and just as good as 2.0 meaning that it's phenomenal especially for a celebrity fragrance. I can smell this strongly for days on clothing and the sillage is noticeable even from a good distance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1984569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1984569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Generic but so comforting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1981080"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1981080#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This one is more fruity sweetness on top! I love it so much. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1978478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1978478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1977601" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xeannie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1819707"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1819707.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xeannie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1977601ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1977601" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1819707">xeannie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-15">11/15/23 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>a fruitier, sweeter take on Cloud in gorgeous pink bottle! <br />
<br />
got this for my birthday and i was so excited even if i haven't smelled this before. i only have an idea what Cloud smells like - which is just an okay scent for me, i think it lacks sweetness and fruitiness. so when they announced the notes for this one, i was so sure i'm going to like it! the opening smells like Cloud, a bit sharp but creamy vanilla without the plasticky note. it then becomes more fruity - dominantly pineapple with berries and coconut. my mother complemented this scent twice and i'm loving this more in the cold weather!<br />
<br />
 lasts 6-8 hours<br />
 fair projection, average scent trail<br />
 10/10 - cute and versatile bottle design<br />
<br />
a more personal option for me in the sea of cloud users! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1977601"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1977601#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1976947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1976947" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KHunton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1061404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1061404.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KHunton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Alhambra/Reyna-89732.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89732.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reyna"title="Reyna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1976947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1976947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1061404">KHunton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-14">11/14/23 21:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another Cloud flanker that I absolutely love<br />
Cloud Pink leans slightly more tropical &amp; summery as opposed to Cloud 2.0 which is creamier, deeper &amp; perfect for winter &amp; Autumn<br />
I feel like I've got a Cloud fragrance for all seasons now<br />
Both flankers have just enough original Cloud DNA plus additional notes to be a perfect flanker<br />
No idea why people complain that they are similar to the original, isn't that the whole point of it being a flanker? Duh! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1976947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1976947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1976066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like the pink bottle colour in person its quite pretty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1973853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1973853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1969024" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; You get the "Cloud base" and longevity of the original . with a red fruity juicy opening - that - will remind you even MORE of pink cotton candy. My 2 cents - take it as you will. P.S. Makes a GREAT gift for a younger person's first perfume  (I'm saying that as a 50 year old!) . This may be sampled at ULTA Beauty here in the USA.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1969024"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1969024#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1968468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843458">Suigintou</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-04">11/04/23 09:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Huge disappointment! Smells like the original Cloud (form which I ordered a sample along this one and of which I also didn't like) with added strawberry flavoured antibiotic smell that I had to take as a child to ear infections (penicillin?). Scent memory is funny.<br />
<br />
Edit! I tried this again after finally falling in love with the OG Cloud. Funny enough, I no longer get that antibiotic smell from this, not so much as I did earlier anyway. Now this just smells like OG Cloud, but pink :D It's like they literally added something to the OG to make it smell like the color pink. I like this one too now. But the difference to OG is so small it doesn't really even matter which one you buy. Btw I don't get why the accord tropical is so high up there on the pyramid. I don't get anything tropical from this at all. I know way more tropical smelling perfumes that don't even have the word tropical in their pyramid (e.g. Dylan turquoise). Maybe I've got it all wrong myself. What makes a perfume tropical? If this is tropical and Dylan turquoise isn't, I'm at loss</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1968468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1968468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1966468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1966468" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jxssicamidnight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/869682"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.869682.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jxssicamidnight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1966468ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1966468" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/869682">jxssicamidnight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-01">11/01/23 22:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As an avid wearer of the original cloud (not so much the 2.0 because the ambroxan is too much for me personally) this is a much welcomed addition into my collection.<br />
It smells so much like the OG - however this is cloud but powdered sweet pink fluffy marshmallows. I have to say I am enjoying this upon first wear!<br />
I was worried with the whipped cream note being gone that Id not like this but it is still rather creamy in a marshmallow fluff way rather than a whipped cream!<br />
They are similar but there are some differences.<br />
<br />
Not sure which cloud I love more now, I adore these both!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1966468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1966468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1965469" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1965469" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zom_Aly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782943"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1782943.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zom_Aly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1965469ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1965469" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782943">Zom_Aly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-31">10/31/23 17:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm actually enjoying this more than the original. Yes, the differences are minimal but to me they're significant. When I first saw the notes I thought this would be a bit tropical or fruity/nectarish due to the pineapple and the coconut water but it's really not the case (and I'm happy about it!). It kinda feels like it could be worn throughrough any season<br />
<br />
It's more soft and rounded than the original, and it does smell to what I think the color pink would smell like. It's strongly femenine and the dry out keeps Cloud's DNA but has a bubblegum-like finish to it that I like. It is quite sweet so if you're not a gourmand lover or you haven't enjoyed any Ariana fragrance so far this probably won't be your thing</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1965469"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1965469#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1963011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1963011" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="squeakyclean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773269"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1773269.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="squeakyclean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1963011ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1963011" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1960585" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Melody Valentine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Melody Valentine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Love-Don-t-Be-Shy-4322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Don't Be Shy"title="Love Don't Be Shy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1960585ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1960585" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747732">Melody Valentine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-25">10/25/23 10:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's nice but it's almost identical to the original in my opinion and doesn't last as long. To be fair though, I only tested it in Boots but it didn't last on my hand or the tester strip, whereas the original one did when I first tried it. It was still super strong on the tester strip the next day and made me wanna go down and buy it. This one is just as pretty, very girly and sweet, maybe a tiny bit more fruity but it's not different enough to need both. Nobody will be able to tell you're wearing the pink one Vs the og. If I was gonna buy any version of Cloud again I'd probably get the intense one, I just wish it was as easy to get hold of and at the same price as the others.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />
You don't need to buy this if you have and love the original as it's pretty much the same but weaker.  Of course I had to have it though! I love most of Ariana Grande perfumes even though I'm 42 and way too old for them I do t give a damn what people think, I love sweet sweet perfumes! <br />
<br />
I must add, I've been doing some research and I really appreciate the fact that some of her fragrances are as close to non toxic/clean as possible . I think this is pretty unique in the celebrity perfume range. FYI this is a 'cleaner' version of cloud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1958392"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1958392#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1956585" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; On second thought I prefer this to the OG!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1955259"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1955259#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954564" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954564" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Atomikbomb_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1211792.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Atomikbomb_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Lady-Emblem-31425.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31425.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lady Emblem"title="Lady Emblem"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954564ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954564" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792">Atomikbomb_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 18:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I honestly enjoy this, but not quite as much as the original Cloud. <br />
<br />
I mean, if you're looking for something sophisticated, upscale and refined...this isn't it. It's 100% fun, whimsical and carefree. Where there was creamed coconut, we now have an extreme ripe strawberry milkshake take on the notorious BR540 sort of airy aura. <br />
<br />
I feel like the pineapple or whatever tart fruits in here *almost, ALMOST* push it to rotten territory. The fruit is very ripe and sweet, but that sour edge nearly makes it smell spoiled, but when it dries down it becomes less jarring. I didn't care for the opening. <br />
<br />
If you're nuts about this type of thing, I don't think it's redundant to the original, but I do feel like the BR540 little sibling trend is wearing thin, and it's becoming passe. Still, I'd be lying if I said I didn't enjoy this. It's nice if you're in the right mood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1954564"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1954564#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954019" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nanalvzpink"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370343"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370343.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nanalvzpink" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51411.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lost Cherry"title="Lost Cherry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); This shouldve been a pretty cotton candy that wouldve paired perfectly with cloud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1954019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1954019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1953738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1953738" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Estiii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782316"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Estiii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/R-E-M-62578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="R.E.M."title="R.E.M."></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1953738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1953738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); Nothing to write home about.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1953491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1953491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1952903" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its not a good combo in my books. I know everyone wished this had a strawberry note yeah I see it now that wouldve been cute. The scent softens on the skin and is pleasant. The original Cloud stays on my skin for hours and I can smell it myself. This Pink Cloud does not do the same. I didn't like the smell of Mod Blush because it didn't suit my skin chemistry. But, the two combined together, fits well! I like the scent, but not love it. Suits me as an everyday scent or if I'm just at home.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1952506"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1952506#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1951386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1947825"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1947825#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946440" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zannajezek"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398225"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1398225.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zannajezek" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946440ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946440" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398225">zannajezek</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 12:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cloud Pink by Ariana Grande is girly and likable. It is the perfect girl next door fragrance. It is casual and sweet, and to me, it smells just like fluffy white marshmallows. There is also a subtle toastiness and smoke element, almost like burning wood, like the air around a bonfire. It reminds me of roasting marshmallows under the stars. It is also quite synthetic smelling but pleasant nevertheless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1946440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1946440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1944319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1944319" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chloemars"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1856017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1856017.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chloemars" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Strangers-Parfumerie/Cherry-Amaretto-81795.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81795.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cherry Amaretto"title="Cherry Amaretto"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1944319ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1944319" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1856017">chloemars</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-04">10/04/23 18:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was SO excited for this because the original Cloud gets me so many compliments. However, when I tried it on in-store, it smelled like rotting fruit and sweat on me. I'm not sure if it starts to smell better with time because I simply couldn't bear it and washed it off. Not for my skin, I guess!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1944319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1944319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1943977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1943977" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tomadeupjazz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298031"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1298031.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tomadeupjazz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Phlur/Vanilla-Skin-95817.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95817.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Skin"title="Vanilla Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1943977ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1943977" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298031">Tomadeupjazz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-04">10/04/23 10:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another Cloud that is just  I really think the cloud dna just works well on my skin because not only do I always love the scent profile on myself but others do as well. When I first got this perfume IDK what was up with my nose or if my bottle was just a little too fresh (I ordered this IMMEDIATELY when it said available) because smelling it and wearing it the first time I was getting that hospital, doctors office, bandaid, sterile glove smell that some people get from this scent DNA. That had never happened before with either cloud nor cloud intense. So I was thinking it may have been the coconut water mixing with the musk and moss scents creating that smell. Anywho after wearing it a couple more times my nose got something completely different and I am beyond OBSESSED with this new Cloud Pink. So much so that it kicked the original off my favorite perfumes line-up. This has taken place as my number 1 cloud scent. It's a little fresher, definitely sweeter, almost like a "cloud" of fluffy airy pink cotton candy. First spray its like a coconut water dragon fruit spritzer, quickly followed up by cotton candy, then settles into that well known cloud dna, musky, airy, soft, slightly gourmand (from the praline) and sweet. I have gotten non-stop compliments on this scent, mostly from men, and I guarantee its from that hazy cotton candy vibe (men love them some simple sweet scents on a feminine woman) It just works. It's currently October but of course still hot af in Georgia, and I have been pulling for this. Not sure about when it's cold but it does still have that original cloud dna so i could probably still get away with wearing it. We'll see. If not I can always pull out my original and save that one for fall and winter and this new Cloud Pink for Spring and Summer. Love this one</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1943977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1943977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942122" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's so subtle/lightweight that I honestly don't think there's much of a point to wearing it. I have to strain to pick up any scent whatsoever. It's my least favorite of the Clouds.<br />
<br />
What I do get is a nondescript sweetness, like someone a mile away is making cotton candy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1942122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1942122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1941322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
