align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1938399"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1938399#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1938356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1938356" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ca3na"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174396"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1174396.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ca3na" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1938356ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1938356" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174396">Ca3na</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-27">09/27/23 03:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin this is the nicest cloud yet.  I love the original cloud on other people but it just doesn't work with my skin chemistry.  The intense is beautiful &amp; works for me, but this one, omg, let me tell you it smells the most like BR540 on my skin, much more so than the other clouds (although none do it quite like BR540 which I have and am sparing) so maybe if the others don't work for you, this one will. Great alternative if you want to save some money.  Envelopes you in a lovely cosy cloud of sugary love. Absolutely love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1938356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1938356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1935859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1935859" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="silverlocusts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/544735"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.544735.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="silverlocusts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Creme-de-Cuir-51469.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51469.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Crme de Cuir"title="Crme de Cuir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1935859ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1935859" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/544735">silverlocusts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-23">09/23/23 21:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me this is a solid flanker; it resembles the original but it also takes the concept in a new direction. I like the amped up fruitiness, which to me makes it feel much more modern versus being just another BR540 imitator. I used up a whole travel spray of the original cloud, but Im thinking that rather than replacing it Ill get this one instead. The original and this are both just easy to wear, no nonsense fragrances (along with AGs REM as well.) Sometimes I want a perfume that might be challenging or more complex, but sometimes I just want something that is what it is. Grandes fragrances do that for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1935859"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1935859#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1934646" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1934646" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="m0userella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814300"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1814300.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="m0userella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1934646ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1934646" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814300">m0userella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-22">09/22/23 10:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As soon as I smelled this, I fell in love. The bottle is suuuuper cute first of all. The smell is so girly and sweet and is exactly what I picture the color pink would smell like. I smelled the OG Cloud and didn't like it as it was too musky for me. But this smells like the good qualities of the OG Cloud + hyperfeminine sweetness. I used to have a That's So Raven perfume when I was a little girl and it smelled like cotton candy. To this day it's still one of the best smells I've ever smelled and it THE scent that influences my scent taste. I haven't been able to find a scent similar to my beloved That's So Raven perfume.. until I smelled Cloud Pink!!! It instantly transported me to being a 7 year old girl and dousing myself in the whole bottle. Cotton candy, dragon fruit and vanilla... this has to be one of my favorite scents tied with Cheirosa 40. Both would pair very nicely too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1934646"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1934646#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1934252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1934252" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Amaranthine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838760"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Amaranthine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1934252ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1934252" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838760">Amaranthine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-22">09/22/23 01:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells just like Cloud with a hint of pineapple in the opening which sadly disappears almost immediately. After that what is left is the original, but a bit cheaper smelling, like there's some non-descript fruit needlessly thrown into the mix. Fruity Cloud would be great if the fruit scent was more rich. Not impressed, but I'll keep testing.<br />
The pink bottle looks wonderful on my tray, so that's a plus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1934252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1934252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1933773" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1933773" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="konga5"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771130"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1771130.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="konga5" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Shaghaf-Oud-50582.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50582.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shaghaf Oud"title="Shaghaf Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1933773ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1933773" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771130">konga5</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-21">09/21/23 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pretty close to the original with a fresh fruity vibe. The fruity vibe stays for a while them walks into the background. The fruity part is zesty and natural smelling (if that means anything to you). My first spritz of this was pretty strong - that made me happy . I can see that this will probably get stronger as my bottle wears on. This will probably be the "favorite Cloud" by fans. In comparison to BR540 - this only brings Cloud closer to it by an inch or 2. BR540 really needs that saffron &amp; the right "berry" note (most likely Raspberry) to pull in the "cotton candy" vibe. I like this a lot and I am waiting for compliments . This is very "happy and daytime".</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1933773"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1933773#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1933157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930638" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="peachdais"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812888"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1812888.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="peachdais" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930638ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930638" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812888">peachdais</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-17">09/17/23 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>whatever made cloud so likable and seductive is completely gone here. as a cloud lover and fan of arianas perfumes, im pretty disappointed. this perfume smells rancid. it smells as if a sweaty little girl sprayed fruity body spray on after running around outside instead of applying deodorant. there is a fruit note in there, whether it be the pineapple or dragonfruit, that literally just smells like sweat. the dry down smells like plastic for sure, which i often hear people say about OG cloud but ive never found the original cloud to smell like plastic. this DEFINITELY has that plastic chemical note that i dont pick up in the original cloud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1930638"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1930638#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929753" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dreamdott"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247828"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1247828.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dreamdott" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Mod-Vanilla-77799.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77799.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mod Vanilla"title="Mod Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929753ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929753" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); Its more fruity and only slightly different from the rest. Cloud pink is morning, cloud OG is , midday and cloud IN is night. Realistically YA DONT NEED IT. Unless youre a collector.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1929753"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1929753#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929281" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fauxmantis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1363562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fauxmantis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929281ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929281" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); The opening is nearly identical to me across all three, but the dry-down of Cloud Pink has a cotton candy sweetness that I always felt was missing from the other two. Also to me it lasts longer than the Intense, but that may just be because I get anosmic to the ambroxan after a while and Cloud Pink at least has something else going on. My only gripe is that I wish the bottle was a better shade of pink? It's kind of orangey</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1929281"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1929281#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A little fruity in the top notes, its pretty but the dry down is just like the original. You dont need both but if youre a collector, enjoy it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1926342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1926342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1926284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1926284" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pearandcitrus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729386"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1729386.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pearandcitrus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83995.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud Pink"title="Cloud Pink"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1926284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1926284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729386">pearandcitrus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-12">09/12/23 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>TLDR; I love it.<br />
<br />
I know that one single fragrance can smell different to many different people, however, with this one in specific, I think it's funny that people look at the notes and the color of the bottle and automatically say the scent is fruiter and sweeter... because that is NOT true (for me).<br />
<br />
This 100% has the original Cloud DNA, almost too similar. Just like the original Cloud, Cloud Pink is slightly fruity right off the bat, but without the lavender/calming-type note that the original Cloud has. <br />
<br />
It settles down pretty similarly too, but the BIGGEST DIFFERENCE I noticed is that at dry-down, Cloud Pink is much muskier, almost second-skin like (think Juliette has a Gun, Glossier You, etc.). <br />
<br />
Overall... Ironically, I think Cloud Pink is not fruitier or sweeter, its muskier and a perfect cozy scent for fall/winter!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1926284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1926284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1925612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1925612" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smoochyscoop"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1466193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smoochyscoop" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nest/Black-Tulip-42889.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42889.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tulip"title="Black Tulip"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1925612ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1925612" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466193">smoochyscoop</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-11">09/11/23 17:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hands down, this is my favorite Cloud. That fruity top with the pitahaya and pineapple is so lovely. Sometimes I wanna smell like ambrosia salad, and this does it for me. Definitely smells like Cloud, but with an added fruity freshness. I'm not mad it only comes in 100ml. I might need a backup bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1925612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1925612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1924756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1924756" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xlia1015x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1823747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1823747.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xlia1015x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-Born-In-Roma-55805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna Born In Roma"title="Valentino Donna Born In Roma"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1924756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1924756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1823747">xlia1015x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-10">09/10/23 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this it smells to me really similar to the og but its way sweeter and it has more of a fruity scent to it and I actually prefer it to the og</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1924756"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1924756#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1924672" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1924672" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuperSueChick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.43791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuperSueChick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1924672ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1924672" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43791">SuperSueChick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-10">09/10/23 14:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love Love obsessed Loooove!<br />
<br />
This must be Barbie's fragrance in her amazing Pink Barbie Dream house (haven't seen the movie).<br />
I just love it, and can't get enough of it!  <br />
I've been looking for a fragrance to love this summer, and this is it! Pink Cloud (PC) is my summer crush!!!<br />
<br />
BTW, my husband gifted me the $500 Greenwich Bond perfume, and no, this is not a "dupe" (thank goodness).  I'm sick of Greenwich, actually.  Its nice but lacks "sweetness" and in comparison to PC, Greenwich is more medicinal and serious.<br />
<br />
This Pink Cloud, yes similar to the original, but this gives me fruity sweetness on a cotton candy pink fluffy cloud without being 13yr old teeny bopper sweet amusement ride! <br />
Its a delicate sweetness, not cloying.  It has a nostalgic plastic-y scent (in the best way possible) like when opening a brand new Barbie out of the box as a kid and smelling Barbie's hair.  <br />
PC makes me feel super girly, find a pretty outfit, put full on make-up, and be as pretty as can be.<br />
(background music please):<br />
I'm a Barbie girl, in the Barbie world<br />
Life in plastic, it's fantastic<br />
You can brush my hair, undress me everywhere<br />
Imagination, life is your creation<br />
<br />
Come on, Barbie, let's go party<br />
<br />
Mmm Mmm Mmm....<br />
<br />
Its DELICIOUS, period. Have I mentioned I love it? Yes, yes I have bc I do, and I'm placing an order for a back up, and a few mini travel ones to throw in my bag. <br />
<br />
To me, longevity is a good solid 6 hour.  I do over spray bc I love it. By the time I go downstairs my husband and kids, compliment the perfume, and aren't coughing bc its too much.  <br />
I'm in my Pink Cloud all day. If I need to retouch, so be it.<br />
Also, side note: I'm not sure if its that men seem to enjoy this fragrance, or its that I enjoy it so much that my vibes are just so positive; that guys (all ages) seem to smile a little more. They seem more polite.  <br />
<br />
Comments say "if you have the original, you don't need this".  I say if you have the original, throw it out and get this!  ()</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1924672"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1924672#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1924670" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It has that same synthetic plastic scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1924670"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1924670#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1924390" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1924390" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1924390ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1924390" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-10">09/10/23 08:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The tropical fruity version of original Cloud. The top notes that you can smell on the skin as soon as you applied the scent are the only differences between the Pink and the old version!  <br />
<br />
Not much else to add. If you like the OG Cloud youll probably like this. Why exactly was this released  when it is so  similar to the original I would never know <br />
<br />
I like better the bottle of the Pink Cloud simply because its pink so I might add this to my collection at some point this year! <br />
<br />
Not to forget, a 2023 scent released that it is not overpriced!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1924390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1924390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923954" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thekinzzz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764897"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1764897.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thekinzzz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Petal-Parade-93121.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93121.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Petal Parade"title="Petal Parade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923954ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923954" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764897">thekinzzz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-09">09/09/23 16:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My husband asked me if I wanted it knowing I had watched a few reviews and it has officially come to Canada recently and I told him to smell it in-store and if he liked it to grab it for me. They were having an event (non-related) and even though he hates big crowds he asked the sales clerk if he could smell it she went and got it for him and he loved it he went and got me a bottle right away. <br />
<br />
He initially when I got into fragrances told me he didnt like sweet scents but so far those are the ones he loves the most on me. Some I cant honestly stand I prefer my sweet fragrances more on the light side I like florals generally more but I will say I love this. I hate the original it smells cheap to me and young like I cannot wear it, but this one I absolutely can. <br />
<br />
I can smell the pineapple for sure and the berries but for me what carries this scent to complete perfection is the musk and the orchid combination is makes it more mature than the original and much more date night vibes. <br />
<br />
I recommend. Not my absolute favourite but it sure surprised me. <br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1923954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1923954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923878" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mikajla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720637"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mikajla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-7-Virtues/Vanilla-Woods-52560.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52560.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Woods"title="Vanilla Woods"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720637">mikajla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-09">09/09/23 14:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>not bad but OG is still the best perfume i know</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1923878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1923878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923817" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923817" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ambersayre"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1814193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ambersayre" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923817ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923817" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814193">Ambersayre</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-09">09/09/23 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find that this is quite different from the original cloud. Yes, the DNA is almost the same at first, but I can easily tell them apart. Cloud pink is much fruitier and sweeter.<br />
I know this is a niche reference, but this perfume reminds me of the strawberry scented blowing bubbles I had as a kid. It came in a pink ice cream cone packaging.(In case this triggers anyones memory, It came in a pack with a mint,  chocolate, and a vanilla one, too). The dry down of this perfume is the EXACT smell of those bubbles. Fruity, sugary, and quite overwhelmingly synthetic. It took me a few hours to place the scent, but now, I can't shake it! Although the scent is nice, I had to return mine because of the connection there. Nostalgic, yes... but I don't want to smell like that! I love my OG cloud and the 2.0 - this one just did not sit well with me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1923817"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1923817#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923292" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumelovere"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumelovere" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923292ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923292" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196236">perfumelovere</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-08">09/08/23 21:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cotton candy watered down body spray with an hour of longevity and no projection. I had to touch my nose to my skin to get anything. What I did detect is similar to the original but ridiculously light. I have body sprays that are stronger. If you have the original I wouldn't bother. The lavender and pear is what make the original so special when layered with vanilla sweet woody musk. It's such a beautiful blend and fortunately I don't pick up on the medicinal aspect like I do with BR540. This was a lost opportunity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1923292"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1923292#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923186" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923186" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Faellen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/862923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.862923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Faellen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Candied-Fantasy-93613.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93613.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Candied Fantasy"title="Candied Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923186ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923186" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/862923">Faellen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-08">09/08/23 17:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's so, so very close to the original Cloud, even for a flanker. The fruitier differences are there - basically pineapple - but barely. No need to own both if you have the OG or 2.0, but I'll use up my 30ml bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1923186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1923186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923084" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923084" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kacey Pembroke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1623584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1623584.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kacey Pembroke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923084ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923084" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1623584">Kacey Pembroke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-08">09/08/23 14:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought Cloud Pink today, and when I first sniffed it of a tester I was like wow it smells a lot like cloud but a bit fruity, it smelt like original cloud but with a fruitier twist. It smells like the dna of the original cloud because you obviously get that whipped cream and praline smell, but when you spray it, and eventually dries down a bit, you do get an opening of the pink pineapple, and wild berries, but it does smell very very similar to the org cloud, so if you already have the original cloud I dont think youll need this one. But your choice x</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1923084"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1923084#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1922079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1526137">Elix67</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-07">09/07/23 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Finally got my hands on this as its released in the UK now. To be honest it smells delicious and sweet much like her other scents, however this is very very similar to the OG cloud to me. First spray is nearly identical to the OG cloud, but dry down I guess is a little fruitier and vanilla like to my nose. I wouldnt rush to by this if you already own cloud but its still nice to add to the collection pink bottle is cute too. I think I still prefer the original cloud but overall still a nice sweet gourmand addition to anyones perfume collection!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1922079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1922079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1922004" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1922004" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andrews22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347861"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1347861.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andrews22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud"title="Cloud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1922004ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1922004" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347861">Andrews22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-07">09/07/23 09:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought Ariana Grandes new perfume yesterday. <br />
I was super excited hearing Ariana releasing a new fragrance and yesterday I had finally smelt it and I was in love with cloud pink. <br />
<br />
Cloud pink opens up to this sweet creamy scent and the dry down is very fruity. This one is very different to the original cloud which is more of a warm coconut creamy scent. <br />
<br />
I love every single Ariana Grande fragrances and Im so happy with cloud pink as well but cloud pink last a lot longer than the original but overall I love both fragrances. <br />
<br />
I definitely recommend this fragrance to any Ariana fans out there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1922004"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1922004#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1921256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1921256" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marie20707"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190576"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marie20707" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Abstraits/Belle-Ame-77895.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77895.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Belle me"title="Belle me"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1921256ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1921256" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190576">Marie20707</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-06">09/06/23 11:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I did a test spray of Greenwich Village Bond No 9 on one hand and Cloud Pink on the other hand. GV is fresher in the opening and its a bit dense. PC starts off fruity and it does remain fruity, but in the dry down it smells similar to GW.<br />
<br />
I can definitely see the comparison to Bond No 9 Greenwich Village. GV was nice, but it was too in your face for me. This has a more subdued vibe of GV that works better for me and my chemistry. So if Greenwich Village was too much, consider trying Cloud Pink.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1921256"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1921256#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1921079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1921079" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HippyDippy57"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="HippyDippy57" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/So-Scandal-60942.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60942.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="So Scandal!"title="So Scandal!"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1921079ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1921079" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700008">HippyDippy57</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-06">09/06/23 07:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As my younger work colleagues have been waiting for the release of this scent, I thought I would try it as they have been desperate to get their hands on it.  On paper, it smells fabulous - I certainly get the pineapple and coconut.  But on my skin, there is an overriding synthetic note which I just don't like.  I would also say that although reasonably priced, I would begrudge paying it when the longevity is an hour tops.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1921079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1921079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920524" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1920524" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CaliBlonde"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307920"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1307920.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CaliBlonde" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Vie-est-Belle-L-Elixir-95856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Vie est Belle L'Elixir"title="La Vie est Belle L'Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1920524ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1920524" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307920">CaliBlonde</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-05">09/05/23 15:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I might get downvoted but imo this is an amazing dupe for Greenwich Village Bond No 9.<br />
<br />
Exact same fruity + praline + Cloud/BR540 combo going on. Different fruit notes but overall their pyramids are close.<br />
<br />
Didnt think much of Cloud Pink at first spray, but once it dried down &amp; started wafting around me I was like wait Ive smelled this before. Greenwich!<br />
<br />
Great lasting power and projection. Sprayed once on my arm and Ive been in a nearly-overpowering scent bubble for hours. Greenwich has similar almost-too-powerful performance. <br />
<br />
Very nice! Definitely the best Cloud. <br />
<br />
For those not familiar with Greenwich: Cloud Pink is a fruitier, denser Cloud with heavy praline.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1920524"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1920524#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1919742" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1919742" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DandyCandy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DandyCandy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1919742ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1919742" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1798757">gemeljoseph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-04">09/04/23 09:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive only smelled the tester in Ulta so my opinion is based on that. I like it. It smells better than the OG Cloud and Cloud Intense.  Its a fruitier, tropical twist to Cloud. It reminds me of one of my favorite summer layering combos I do with Jimmy Choo I Want Choo and BR540. Unfortunately this doesnt last on me. I sprayed two blasts on my left wrist and then walked around the store for a bit and by the time I got to the cashier the scent was barely there. This wasnt too much of a surprise though because the Cloud Intense doesnt last on me either but Pink Cloud was considerably a lot shorter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I think it just smelled cheap.  This wishes it smelled as good as Pink Sugar.  If you like this type of gourmand scent Pink Sugar is a better bet.  It smells to me like the original cloud w/ more sugary notes and fruity notes thrown in.  Nothing to justify the price.  I dislike the original but I will admit the original Cloud is better than this.  To many genres mixed in here.  I wish this girl would quit making fragrances.  Her line is trash.  The bottles are stupid, the perfumes are all bad.  I just can't say enough bad things about this whole line.  I don't get the hype and I like celeb fragrances but AG line keeps getting worse.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1917392"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1917392#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1916642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415339">laceylovesperfume</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-30">08/30/23 21:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is OG Cloud with a heavy pineapple note! Sadly it is not for me. I absolutely love OG Cloud, and many who love it as well are familiar with a somewhat plastic essence. Some people love it, some hate it. For some reason that plastic essence is majorly amplified by the pairing of pineapple in Cloud Pink. On my skin it smells like the pineapple you get in jello from the store for your kids. I strongly dislike it personally.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1915832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1915832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; For reference, Eilish smells like toothpaste to me. So if your nose picks up on those kind of smells you might not like this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1915051"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1915051#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1914736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
