padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250476">perfume_angel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-11">08/11/23 01:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All Ariana dramas aside, I know we all cant wait to get our hands on Cloud pink! How adorable is the pink cloud bottle <br />
<br />
Also, how are people voting for this perfume reminds me of when its not even out yet, they havent smelt it, and the displayed notes are wrong. <br />
<br />
The notes on Fragrantica are incorrect. These are the official notes:<br />
<br />
Top : Dragon fruit, berries, Pink pineapple <br />
<br />
Middle: vanilla orchid, coconut water, blush ambrette <br />
<br />
Base: musk, amber woods , sweetened praline, magenta moss<br />
<br />
I do believe that this could be similar to Burberry her due to the berries, but Im hoping it has a unique and new twist. Ariana said that this is a sister scent to Cloud, so Im happy that it will likely still have the iconic Cloud DNA. Cant wait to smell it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1899299"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1899299#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1895484" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1895484" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Teoman Bulut"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1534924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1534924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Teoman Bulut" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1895484ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1895484" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); (They didnt even try the fragrance)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1895484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1895484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="83995" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

ariana said "i'm feeling promiscu-- i mean adventurous! barbie is in! let's do cloud with 2 note changes AND MAKE IT PINK!"<br />
<br />
my thing is... if your perfume is going to act like a body mist, PRICE IT correctly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1912855"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1912855#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1894199" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930638" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="peachdais"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812888"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1812888.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="peachdais" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930638ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930638" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812888">peachdais</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-17">09/17/23 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>whatever made cloud so likable and seductive is completely gone here. as a cloud lover and fan of arianas perfumes, im pretty disappointed. this perfume smells rancid. it smells as if a sweaty little girl sprayed fruity body spray on after running around outside instead of applying deodorant. there is a fruit note in there, whether it be the pineapple or dragonfruit, that literally just smells like sweat. the dry down smells like plastic for sure, which i often hear people say about OG cloud but ive never found the original cloud to smell like plastic. this DEFINITELY has that plastic chemical note that i dont pick up in the original cloud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="1930638"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=1930638#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141011" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PhantomBelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029931"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2029931.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PhantomBelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narcotica/Narco-Oasis-84576.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84576.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narco Oasis"title="Narco Oasis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141011ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141011" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029931">PhantomBelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 07:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My skin amplifies the musk, amberwood and moss in this fragrance so much it makes it hard for me to wear it--the top notes can't make it smooth/fruity/sweet enough to tolerate. It is a long lasting fragrance on skin and clothes, it's just not for me. A good value for the people who can pull it off. Work safe, not blind buy safe. Purchased at: Ulta</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83995"comment_id="2141011"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-Pink-83995.html?ccid=2141011#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="83995" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

                <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Brands</span></div>

        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">48.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

    <script>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
